Texts.Chs: 在星际间核心的种族中，很少有人能像企鹅那样唱出动听的歌曲。 他们的人已经把他们的声带磨练了几千年，进化成了一些科学上已知的最先进的发声器官。他们能够达到惊人的15到40个八度音程范围，这取决于他们的种族传统！
Texts.Eng: Among the races in the galactic core, few are as capable of beautiful song as the Peglaci. Their people have honed their vocal cords over millenia into some of the most advanced sound-making organs known to science. They are capable of reaching a stunning 15 to 40 octave range, depending on their familial heritage!
An examination of Peglaci oral tradition.

Texts.Chs: 另一个很好的例子就是赫夫拉军团，整支由企鹅组成的大地守护团精英小队。 通过特殊的基于声音的训练，他们能够消除威胁，甚至不需要射击。抚慰目标入睡，然后囚禁他们，比流血的工作要干净得多。
Texts.Eng: Another fine example would be the Hevlar Corps, an elite branch of the Protectorate Defense Force composed entire of Peglaci. Through special sound-based training they are capable of eliminating threats without even needing to shoot. Soothing targets to sleep, and then imprisoning them, is much cleaner than wet works.

Texts.Chs: 举个例子，来自古鲁拉绅士牧场的玛德琳·克诺希克夫。她用自己的歌声吸引了0.25光年以外的追求者，这要感谢艺术部最先进的扬声器。她还用这种声音让她的客户保持冷静和良好的行为。这对她的待产妇来说是个恩惠。
Texts.Eng: Take, for example, Madame Knoshik of the Gurula Gentleman's Ranch. She uses her song to draw in suitors to her establishment over a distance of 0.25 light years thanks to state-of-the-art speakers on the exterior. She also uses this voice to keep her clients calm and well-behaved. A boon to her women-in-waiting.

Texts.Chs: 然后，理所当然还有沃林·泰，被称为歌剧天后。她曾在星际间各地的观众面前表演，许多人声称她的表演比最昂贵的街头毒品更令人陶醉。 她的声音是传奇的素材，票价完全值得这样的声誉。
Texts.Eng: Then of course there is Vorlin Tae, reknowned opera Diva. She has performed to audiences across the galaxy, and many claim her shows are more intoxicating than even the most expensive street drugs. Her voice is the stuff of legends and tickets are appropriately priced for such a reputation.

Texts.Chs: 他们的声音还有许多其他的潜在应用，我们可能只是触及了可能性的皮毛。
Texts.Eng: There are so many other potential applications for their voices that we've likely barely scratched the surface of what is possible.

Texts.Chs: 这意味着它们经常能够在大多数物种甚至听不到的频率上振动声带。如果他们能找到正确的频率，他们的“歌声”甚至能够使他人平静下来。这在他们这个种族的专业人员中产生了一些独特的才能。
Texts.Eng: This means that they are often capable of vibrating their vocal cords at frequencies most species are not even able to hear. Their 'songs' are even capable of calming others if they can find the right frequency. This has led to some unique talents among professionals of their species.
